channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Fans Choose XG’s ‘Gala’ as This Week’s Favorite New Music
item.description: 🌟 Let's party with XG's 'Gala'! 🎉 Fans have spoken and this week's jam is 🔥 #NewMusicAlert #FanFavorite

item.title: Sonny Curtis, Crickets Member And “I Fought The Law” Writer, Dead At 88
item.description: RIP Sonny Curtis 🎸🌟 Your music lives on forever! 💔 #Legend #IFoughtTheLaw

item.title: Yung Lean and Bladee Share Video for New Song “Inferno”: Watch
item.description: 🔥 Dive into the ethereal world of Yung Lean and Bladee with their mesmerizing new video for "Inferno"! 🌟 #YungLean #Bladee #Inferno

item.title: Phish Address Fatal Stabbing At Hampton Concert
item.description: Sending love and healing vibes to the Phish community 🎶❤️ Let's keep the music alive and spread positivity! #phish #peaceandlove

item.title: John Stamos Finally Appears at Chicago’s Riot Fest After Organizers’ 12-Year Pursuit
item.description: 🎸 Uncle Jesse in the house! @JohnStamos rocks @RiotFest after a 12-year love chase. Have mercy, that's dedication! 🤘 #RiotFest #JohnStamos #MusicNews
